question: Can you find me a recipe for chocolate chip cookies and generate an image of freshly baked cookies?
true_answer: Here is a recipe for chocolate chip cookies: 1 cup butter, softened, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup packed brown sugar, 2 eggs, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 teaspoons hot water, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, and 1 cup chopped walnuts. Image of freshly baked chocolate chip cookies generated.

steps.content: Can you find me a recipe for chocolate chip cookies and generate an image of freshly baked cookies?

Recipe found: 1 cup butter, softened, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup packed brown sugar, 2 eggs, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 teaspoons hot water, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, and 1 cup chopped walnuts.

Do you have tips for making the cookies chewier?
Plan: Search for tips on making cookies chewier.
Searching for tips on making cookies chewier.
To make cookies chewier, try substituting some of the white sugar with brown sugar, adding an extra egg yolk, or reducing baking time slightly.

Here is a recipe for chocolate chip cookies: 1 cup butter, softened, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup packed brown sugar, 2 eggs, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 teaspoons hot water, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, and 1 cup chopped walnuts. Image of freshly baked chocolate chip cookies generated. For chewier cookies, substitute some of the white sugar with brown sugar, add an extra egg yolk, or reduce baking time slightly.
